data.persona: I am very small. I am very old. I was found near the ocean.
data.description:
You are in the Lava Lake.
A vast lake of molten magma. The temperature is well above that which would kill most mortal beings. It is surrounded by black rock formed by cooled magma. The bubbling pit seems entirely devoid of life.
There's a sedimentary rock, a black rock, and a molten magma here.
The wife is here.

You are carrying an ancient disease.

data.short_motivation: I need the molten magma to give to my wife.
data.mid_motivation: My wife will carry the molten magma tainted with my ancient disease to the surface of the ocean.
data.long_motivation: A fisherman will collect the molten magma thinking it's treasure and unwittingly spread my ancient disease to humanity and I will rule the earth.
